title: Gift center
body: Trying to send a gift to a friend and I get the following message : your friend's gift pool is not large enought to receive a mystery gift.

replies.body: Thanks for the reports on this, fam!  We've been[ tracking the issue](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005959727--Apr-19-Gifting-Champions-with-IP-is-currently-generating-an-unrelated-error-message-this-will-only-occur-if-your-friend-already-has-the-champion-), and it looks like it happens if you're trying to gift someone who already has the champion unlocked on their own.  Confirm with your friend that they've already unlocked the content, but hit me up if you run into any issues.  Thanks!
